resources.string: Select date\n (the closest asteroids to Earth will be shown)

This app is a quick reference guide to asteroids. Here you can get information about small bodies in the solar system, see the Picture of the Day from NASA, and also get data about asteroids via Radar (provided free as an API by NASA).
*When writing this application, the following were used: MVVM architecture, Glide, API (api.nasa.gov), Retrofit, RecyclerView, View Binding, GSON, Lottie
